des:
ArgomTech's skill for Alexa-enabled smart products offer control of various smart devices, such as cameras & doorbells, using simple voice commands through Alexa-enabled devices, such as Echo Dot. For example: “Alexa, show me the living room camera”.

To link your compatible smart devices with the Alexa skills, follow these steps:

1. Download the ArgomTech App on your mobile device.
2. Open the App and sign-in / register to your account.
3. Tap on the "+" button on the top right corner of the screen to add a new device.
4. Follow the instructions provided in the app to connect the smart device to your Wi-Fi network.
5. Once connected, replace the name of the device to your desired name by clicking on the gear icon at the top right corner, on the "Device name" field enter the new name & press "Save".
6. At the bottom right of the App screen, click “Me”, and select “Alexa” under “Third-Party Voice Services”
7. Press “Sign in With Amazon” and follow the sign-in instructions.
8. Click on “Allow” at the bottom of the screen, allowing permission for ArgomTech to access Alexa.
9. Follow the instructions on that page to complete the device connection.

Here is a list of commands that you can use with Amazon Alexa:
"Alexa, show me the kitchen camera" 
"Alexa, turn on the living room lights”
NOTE: Some of the commands may not be compatible with your device.
